text: Fernando Torres was a weightlifter from Puerto Rico. Torres competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics, the 1964 Summer Olympics and the 1968 Summer Olympics. He was born on 14 December 1941 and died on 7 January 2009.Fernando Torres == References == Category:1941 births Category:2009 deaths Category:American weightlifters Category:Olympians for Puerto Rico
title: Fernando Torres (weightlifter)
